name: Weckmann Runner
description:
Simple Endless Runner for LD36 Warmup

This game was intentionally created for Android, but this version is playable with keyboard too.

CONTROLS

Space - Jump
RightCTRL - Slide
Mouse

All the art was done by my gf. She never worked on art for a game before and i think she did a great job.

Programming and game design was on my part.

All in all it took us about a day to create this "game".
